title: Old Sport: The First Members Only Speakeasy
description:
Old Sport is the first real-world speakeasy accessible only by NFT. Their genesis token, minting on July 27 at oldsport.xyz, is a membership card to a bar full of dimly lit nooks and divine libations. Membership is limited to 1,920, and each member (+ 3 friends) receives access to Old Sport's hidden, intimate bar slated to open in early 2023 in Los Angeles.

https://twitter.com/oldsport_xyz

https://oldsport.xyz/

https://www.premint.xyz/old-sport/

discord.gg/7ryCenbr
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
